Blacknighmare::

"Are you OK?" asked the femme "By the way... I'm Blacknightmare"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Orchestra::
> 
>      Orchestra grinned.
> 
>       "Ah, please, take me to your leader, I'm awaiting to join 
you," He
> said, smiling.
> 
>        He went to walk over, but then he fell onto his knees.  He 
got up,
> wiping dirt off him.
> 
>          "Uh, I had a rough landing," He muttered, not really to
> Blacknightmare, but not to himself either.
